Detector.Details: This detector warns about methods marked with the KnownDefect annotation.
This detector warns about methods marked with the KnownAndAcceptedDefect annotation.

BugPattern.Details:
Sometimes, especially when trying to document the existing behavior of a legacy system, known defects are found that cannot be fixed immediately.

The KnownDefect annotation can be added to the method to indicate a problem, and all KnownDefects can be collected using FindBugs.

BugPattern.LongDescription: {1} contains a known and accepted defect.
BugPattern.Details:
Sometimes, especially when trying to document the existing behavior of a legacy system, known defects are found that cannot be fixed immediately.

The KnownAndAcceptedDefect annotation can be added to the method to indicate a known problem that will not be fixed, and all KnownAndAcceptedDefects can be collected using FindBugs.
